content: पुटः --टं [पुट्-क] {@--1@} A fold. {@--2@} A hollow space, cavity, concavity; भिन्नपल्लवपुटो वन निलः <ls>R. 9. 68</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 23</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 12</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 9</ls>; अंजलिपट, नासापुट, कर्णपुट &c. {@--3@} A cup made of a leaf folded or doubled; a vessel of leaves; दुग्ध्वा पयः पत्रपुटे मदीयं <ls>R. 2. 65</ls>: <ls>Ms. 6.-8.</ls> {@--4@} Any shallow receptacle. {@--5@} The pod or capsule which envelops young shoots. {@--6@} A sheath, cover, covering. {@--7@} An eyelid. (पुटी also in all these senses) {@--8@} A horse's hoof. --टः {@--1@} A casket. {@--2@} The contracting of anything. {@--3@} A folding of anything so as to form a cup. --टं {@--1@} A nutmeg. {@--2@} Two vessels joined together for medical purposes.
